transcript:
so why are you not starting your
business that you want because your
mother who has never started a business
and her entire life thinks it's a bad
idea why are you taking relationship
advice from someone who can't seem to
keep a relationship it doesn't make any
sense when deciding whether or not to
take advice from someone it's really
simple ask yourself one question would I
want to trade places with that person
based off of the advice that they're
giving me if the answer is no let the
advice go in one ear out the other and
continue on your own path
